snippet.title: Cross The Ages: TCG | Game Live Strem w/ Pedro Pro Flesh and Blood Player
snippet.description:
For this Day 6 of Game Live Stream, we are playing against Pedro, a pro player of Flesh and Blood ! 

Counter: - 15 days until the game's release! 
 
➡️ Subscribe to our channel for the latest streams and videos: https://youtu.be/1Lpvp7qvZio. 
➡️ What is Cross Les Ages: https://www.crosstheages.com/
➡️ Join our Telegram: https://t.me/CrossTheAges
 
==================================
 
Cross the Ages is a free-to-play game accompanied by a free-to-read book (written by thirteen different famous authors), designed to feed the collection of digital trading cards. Cross the Ages is thus the first blockchain game based on literature.

The game offers a full cycle of the value chain allowing players to access centralized digital cards on cell phones, own NFTs on a blockchain, maintain physical security of NFTs, and finally stake assets for long-term liquidity through decentralized blockchain-based tokenomics.

The game harnesses the nostalgia of trading cards, but offers a modern application through technology. With a release date of September 2022, Cross the Ages has worked with four international game studios to deliver an NFT game project unlike any other. A project designed to inspire players and give them a sense of community.
 
==================================
 
➡️ FOLLOW US:
 
YouTube - (Subscribe to our channel now!) https://youtu.be/1Lpvp7qvZio 
Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/crosstheages/
Website - https://www.crosstheages.com/
Medium - https://medium.com/@crosstheages
Discord - https://discord.gg/crosstheages
Twitter - https://twitter.com/CrossTheAges
Telegram - https://t.me/CrossTheAges
